page.title: 01MARLBOROUGH TOWN
page.content:
Population: 6100 Market Days: Wednesdays/Saturdays
Marlborough is a small country town on the main London-Bath (A4) road, serving a mainly agricultural economy in the surrounding area. It is a favoured stopping place for travellers, with many hotels and restaurants, together with a rich variety of shops. Within the town are several small scale industries, producing highly specialised goods, from puppets to leathercraft. New housing developments are becoming popular with workers in fast-growing Swindon.
